name: Capital Ring link to Woolwich Arsenal station

ai.summary: A short, easy 2.3 km segment of the Capital Ring that runs toward Woolwich Arsenal station. This urban leg offers a flat, scenic riverside stroll with parks and open spaces along the Thames.
ai.terrain_summary: Primarily paved paths and sidewalks with occasional grass verges; mostly flat with gentle, easily navigable terrain; some street crossings required.
ai.safety_notes: Urban trail—watch for pedestrians, cyclists, and traffic at crossings. Stay aware of surroundings, especially in busy areas. Carry a map or offline route and plan for weather changes. Daylight preferred; bring a light layer.
recommended_gear: Phone with offline map or local map app
ai.best_seasons: All year round; best in spring and autumn when temperatures are mild and crowds are thinner.

seo.title: Capital Ring: Easy 2.3 km walk to Woolwich Arsenal
seo.meta_description: Discover a short, easy 2.3 km segment of the Capital Ring near Woolwich Arsenal station in London. Flat riverside walking with parks and views of the Thames.
seo.h1: Capital Ring — 2.3 km Easy Walk to Woolwich Arsenal Station
